thread.title: Fraser Yachts Announces the Sale of Three Yachts in July and Announces Four New Central Agency Sales Listings
thread.title_full: Fraser Yachts Announces the Sale of Three Yachts in July and Announces Four New Central Agency Sales Listings - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Fraser Yachts Announces the Sale of Three Yachts in July and Announces Four New Central Agency Sales Listings
text:
Fraser Yachts, the world's leading yacht brokerage, announces the sale of three yachts and the addition of four yachts to their fleet of superyachts for sale.
 MONACO, August 21, Fraser Yachts is pleased to announce the sale of three yachts for the month of July: M/Y 55 NISHII BANNENBERG, M/Y ARIANNA -sold in house- and M/Y CANEA. This month, Fraser Yachts announces the addition of four yachts to their fleet of superyachts for sale , including M/Y DUMB LUCK, M/Y FOAM, M/Y STELLA DI MARE and M/Y NORTH.
M/Y DUMB LUCK is a 38.71m semi-displacement yacht with a timeless interior decor and layout with fantastic facilities, ideal for family holidays. The tri-deck yacht was built in the Crescent Custom Yachts shipyard and has the ability to accommodate ten guests in an on-deck master suite and four staterooms. She also has incredible features, including an open and bright saloon and sky lounge, as well as superb deck spaces, perfect for entertaining guests. M/Y DUMB LUCK is on the market for USD 6,900,000.
The beautiful and modern M/Y FOAM is a 35.60m Admiral Tecnomar yacht built in 2014, and is another incredible addition to the Fraser Yachts sales fleet. The long-range displacement yacht has a stylish and contemporary light interior, with a steel hull and a sleek aluminium superstructure. She can accommodate nine guests in four spacious and luxurious staterooms. There is also a full beam owner's suite with double access. M/Y FOAM also features a lounge area and cinema room on the main deck, as well as a sun deck, beach club at aft and a side garage for tender and toys. She is the perfect yacht to enjoy with family and friends. M/Y FOAM is available for EUR 8,500,000.
29.50m M/Y STELLA DI MARE is a Cantiere delle Marche yacht built in 2013. She is a rare and exceptional pocket explorer vessel, designed for both world cruising or family cruising along the coast. She features expansive deck spaces and an impressive interior volume. Presented in stunning condition from the previous owner, she is on the market for EUR 7,250,000.
M/Y NORTH is a 21.95m Darling Shipyard trawler yacht built in 2000 and launched in 2002. She is a unique vessel with a custom designed hydraulic davit system, two generators and twin Cummins engines with a 1,500 mile range. She features two staterooms with an elegantly finished interior and a skylounge bridge with an office that offers 360 degree visibility. She is a great Northwest cruising boat available on the market for USD 795,000.
If you would like high-res photography or further information about any of the Fraser Yachts sales listings, please contact Randi Myers at Fraser Yachts Randi.Myers@fraseryachts.com .
Fraser Yachts is the world's leading, full-service yachting company, and provides a professional team of yachting experts ready to support, advise and to assist you in every aspect of superyacht charter, luxury yacht sales , yacht ownership, and day-to-day operation. Visit their website at www.fraseryachts.com for further information.
